headline: LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (LYB): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on LyondellBasell Industries N.V. on Aurelion Research’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on LYB. LyondellBasell Industries N.V.’s share was trading at $50.47 as of January 28th. LYB’s trailing and forward P/E were 104.96 and 14.84 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
